job_details.Functieomschrijving:
CyberArk is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team responsible for the CyberArk is looking for a senior software engineer to join our elite team which is responsible for building a platform that serves all CyberArk's SaaS products.

   In this role, you will be using AWS serverless architecture, AWS CDK &Python to design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production.

   The team works in full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams. Together we produce complex and advanced platforms that meet the highest security standards and NFRs.

   We are looking forward for an energetic and versatile person to join our family and help us achieve our goals.
     * Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment
     * Design and implement the infrastructure of the system.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources.
     * Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
     * Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
     * Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer- SaaS Platform

CyberArk is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team responsible for the CyberArk is looking for a senior software engineer to join our elite team which is responsible for building a platform that serves all CyberArk's SaaS products.

   In this role, you will be using AWS serverless architecture, AWS CDK &Python to design, develop, test, secure & deploy services from planning to production.

   The team works in full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams. Together we produce complex and advanced platforms that meet the highest security standards and NFRs.

   We are looking forward for an energetic and versatile person to join our family and help us achieve our goals.
     * Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment
     * Design and implement the infrastructure of the system.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
     * Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources.
     * Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices to foster a culture of learning and innovation.
     * Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
     * Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering and SaaS platform development, with only a brief mention of ML/AI. The core responsibilities and technologies listed do not align with specialized ML or GenAI engineering roles.

phrases: align technical solutions with strategic goals
translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to understand the business context and translate it into technical requirements, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

phrases: design, develop, test, secure & deploy services
Practice all software development life cycles in agile oriented environment
Design and implement the infrastructure of the system
Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency
Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the core activities of software engineering, including design, development, testing, deployment, and lifecycle management within an agile framework.

phrases: deploy services from planning to production
secure & deploy services
Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency through continuous monitoring and optimization of serverless resources
job_tasks.justification: These phrases cover the deployment of services into production, security aspects of deployment, and continuous monitoring and optimization of resources, which are key components of MLOps.

phrases: Develop and deploy machine learning models and AI algorithms to extract insights, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the development and deployment of machine learning models and AI algorithms, fitting the definition of the Modeling task.

phrases: full collaboration with security architects, product managers, and other development teams
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, sharing knowledge and best practices
Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
foster a culture of learning and innovation
design, develop, test, secure & deploy services
Optimize application performance, scalability, and cost efficiency
Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with an emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability, and performance
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members
Explore new technologies and tools to keep us using cutting-edge solutions
foster a culture of learning and innovation
